data.name: Herbalstore Naturindo
data.description:
Herbalstore Naturindo (Online Store Jakarta)
Kami menjual Obat herbal 100% alami dari tumbuhan pilihan yang di ekstraksi dengan teknologi modern dan sudah memiliki standarisasi BPOM dan Halal MUI.
Kami juga menjual barang - barang kebutuhan dan juga kecantikan.
*Toko Buka 24 Jam
Pesanan dibawah jam 18.00 kita proses dihari yang sama

initialTranslations.seo_flash_sale_description: Penawaran Harga Terbaik di Indonesia! Diskon Produk Pilihan Update Tiap Hari. Beli Sekarang Selama Persediaan Promo Masih Ada.
initialTranslations.seo_flash_sale_description_in: Buy products with huge discounts online on new hot deals daily! Enjoy great online deals with good quality at low prices by Shopee {{locale}}! Stretch your dollar with huge discounts on selected products, offered for limited-time periods, while stocks last!
initialTranslations.seo_flash_sale_description_my: Maximise your value with Shopee Malaysia's Shocking Sale! With Lowest Prices Guaranteed, you can buy your ideal goods at mega discounts! Hurry and enjoy our limited-time deals on selected products while stocks last.
initialTranslations.seo_flash_sale_description_ph: Great online deals with good quality at low prices by Shopee Philippines. Grab promotions with huge discounts and voucher codes on new flash deals daily!
initialTranslations.seo_flash_sale_description_sg: Enjoy Lowest Prices Guaranteed with Shopee Singapore's daily Flash Deals. Stretch your dollar with huge discounts on selected products, offered for limited-time periods, while stocks last!
initialTranslations.seo_flash_sale_title: Siapa Cepat Dia Dapat! ⚡ Flash Sale | Shopee Indonesia
